//: Material strength based on MHFU's weakest armor of a monster material. Well, I know its not a good basis, but let us try it anyways...
Resistance calculation: bash(def/4), cut(def/3), acid(water+ice/2+3), fire(fire+5), elec(thunder+5) and chip(dragon+5*3.25)
Weapon damage calculation: base(bash resist+cut resist/2*2.5) + sword&shield(-1) + greatsword(+5) + hammer(+3) + lance(+3) + dualblades(-3) + lbg(/4) + hbg(/2)
name: Kut-Ku
